function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of accessible park areas per capita","Impact":"Increased stress and anxiety among residents, reduced ability to mitigate contagion","Mitigation":"Increase accessibility to green spaces, improve park infrastructure, and create alternative outdoor spaces","Technologies":"Urban planning and design technologies, remote sensing for green space monitoring","People":"Residents in densely populated urban areas","Owner":"City planners, local government"},{"Description":"Spatial inequalities for vulnerable populations","Impact":"Higher vulnerability to contagion, longer commute times, limited access to urban services","Mitigation":"Improve accessibility to jobs and healthcare, address housing inequality, and provide alternative transportation options","Technologies":"Urban planning technologies, telemedicine, public transportation infrastructure","People":"Low-income and high-risk populations","Owner":"Local government, community organizations"}]}
